translation: To search for, to call (on the phone)
To ride, to get on (a bus)
Last (week, month, year), one that passes
To talk with, to meet with
To treat, to give something for free
To be cut, to be turned off
To do, to make, to perform
To build (a building), to establish (an organization)
Open during late hours (ER, eczane, etc)
I'm sorry (for a wrong I've done)
Charge (for a phone or other device)
